verses.verse: In the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, in the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> and all his <S%H2428>army<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and they besieged <S%H6696>it<s%>.

And in the <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%>, in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, the <S%H8672>ninth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, the <S%H5892>city<s%> was broken <S%H1234>up<s%>.

And all the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> came <S%H935>in<s%>, and <S%H3427>sat<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>, even <S%H5371>Nergal<s%>–sharezer, <S%H5562>Samgar<s%>–nebo, <S%H8310>Sarsechim<s%>, <S%H7249>Rab<s%>–saris, <S%H5371>Nergal<s%>–sharezer, <S%H7248>Rab<s%>–mag, with all the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

And it came to <S%H6667>pass<s%>, that when Zedekiah the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H582>them<s%>, and all the men of <S%H4421>war<s%>, then they <S%H1272>fled<s%>, and went <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>, by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1588>garden<s%>, by the <S%H8179>gate<s%> between the two <S%H2346>walls<s%>: and he went <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6160>plain<s%>.

But the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>' <S%H2428>army<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5381>them<s%>, and overtook <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>: and when they had <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H5927>him<s%>, they brought him up to <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> to <S%H7247>Riblah<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%>, where he <S%H1696>gave<s%> judgment upon <S%H4941>him<s%>.

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H7819>killed<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> in <S%H7247>Riblah<s%> before his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>: also the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H7819>killed<s%> all the <S%H2715>nobles<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.
Moreover he put <S%H5786>out<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%>'s <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H631>bound<s%> him with <S%H5178>chains<s%>, to <S%H935>carry<s%> him to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

And the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> <S%H8313>burned<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, with <S%H784>fire<s%>, and broke <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H2346>walls<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

Then <S%H5018>Nebuzar<s%>–adan the <S%H7227>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> carried away <S%H1540>captive<s%> into <S%H894>Babylon<s%> the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H7604>remained<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and those that fell <S%H5307>away<s%>, that <S%H5307>fell<s%> to <S%H3499>him<s%>, with the rest of the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H7604>remained<s%>.

But <S%H5018>Nebuzar<s%>–adan the <S%H7227>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> <S%H7604>left<s%> of the <S%H1800>poor<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, which had <S%H3972>nothing<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> and <S%H3010>fields<s%> at the same <S%H3117>time<s%>.

Now <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> gave <S%H6680>charge<s%> concerning <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H3027>to<s%> <S%H5018>Nebuzar<s%>–adan the <S%H7227>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
<S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H5869>him<s%>, and look well to <S%H6213>him<s%>, and do him no <S%H3972>harm<s%>; but <S%H6213>do<s%> unto him even as he shall say unto <S%H1696>you<s%>.

So <S%H5018>Nebuzar<s%>–adan the <S%H7227>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%>, and <S%H5021>Nebushasban<s%>, <S%H7249>Rab<s%>–saris, and <S%H5371>Nergal<s%>–sharezer, <S%H7248>Rab<s%>–mag, and all the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>'s <S%H7227>princes<s%>;

Even they <S%H7971>sent<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> out of the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>prison<s%>, and <S%H5414>committed<s%> him unto <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%>, that he should <S%H3318>carry<s%> him <S%H1004>home<s%>: so he <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>.
Now the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, while he was shut <S%H6113>up<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>prison<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1980>Go<s%> and <S%H559>speak<s%> to <S%H5663>Ebed<s%>–melech the <S%H3569>Ethiopian<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; <S%H935>Behold<s%>, I will bring my <S%H1697>words<s%> upon this <S%H5892>city<s%> for <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and not for <S%H2896>good<s%>; and they shall be accomplished in that <S%H3117>day<s%> before <S%H6440>you<s%>.

But I will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: and you shall not be <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H6440>whom<s%> you are <S%H3016>afraid<s%>.

For I will <S%H4422>surely<s%> <S%H4422>deliver<s%> <S%H5307>you<s%>, and you shall not fall by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, but your <S%H5315>life<s%> shall be for a <S%H7998>prey<s%> unto <S%H982>you<s%>: because you have put your trust in <S%H5002>me<s%>, says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
